page.title: 06HOME LIFE
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A 7 YEAR OLD GIRL. SALLY CLARKE.. 7a.m. get out of bed, wash and dress 7.30 a.m. eat beakfast.. cereal ,toast with jam and milk to drink After breakfast play with my brother Tim or read quietly, or watch T.V. 8.40 a.m. Set off to school with mum and my brother. We walk as it is only 10 minutes to get to school. Some children come by car and bus 9 a.m....12 noon School work 12 noon ...1.15 p.m. Lunch time.I eat my sandwhiches then play out in the playground. 1.15p.m.....3.30p.m. back to work in school.(we have a 15 min break at 2,45p.m.) 3.30p.m....7.30p.m. Eat, watch T.V.or play. 8.15p.m.. go to bed.
